get.description: Returns a list of public collections

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number. Used for pagination with page_size

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of results included on a page. Used for pagination with page

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results included on a page. Used for pagination with query

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Where to start the listing(the offset of the first result). Used for pagination with limit

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The field by which to order. Default varies by endpoint/resource.

parameters.name: institution
parameters.description: only return collections from this institution

parameters.name: published_since
parameters.description: Filter by collection publishing date. Will only return collections published after the date. date(ISO 8601) YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: modified_since
parameters.description: Filter by collection modified date. Will only return collections published after the date. date(ISO 8601) YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: only return collections from this group

parameters.name: resource_doi
parameters.description: only return collections with this resource_doi

parameters.name: doi
parameters.description: only return collections with this doi

parameters.name: handle
parameters.description: only return collections with this handle

post.description: Returns a list of public collections

get.description: Returns a list of public collection Versions
View details for a certain version of a collection
Returns a list of public collection articles

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number. Used for pagination with page_size

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of results included on a page. Used for pagination with page

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Where to start the listing(the offset of the first result). Used for pagination with limit

200.description: OK. An array of articles belonging to the collection

post.description: Create a new Collection by sending collection information
Returns a list of private Collections

When a collection is published, a new public version will be generated. Any further updates to the collection will affect the private collection data. In order to make these changes publicly visible, an explicit publish operation is needed.
Associate new authors with the collection. This will add new authors to the list of already associated authors

put.description: Associate new authors with the collection. This will remove all already associated authors and add these new ones

post.description: Associate new categories with the collection. This will add new categories to the list of already associated categories

put.description: Associate new categories with the collection. This will remove all already associated categories and add these new ones

post.description: Associate new articles with the collection. This will add new articles to the list of already associated articles

put.description: Associate new articles with the collection. This will remove all already associated articles and add these new ones
Update existing private link for this collection

delete.description: Disable/delete private link for this collection
